K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-1: a'arya sarba aan ta r'a li bi sho dha ni n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-2: bod skad du; 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong shing aa mra'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-8: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'i chos su gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-9: de'i tshe 'du byed kyi lhag ma lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chud nas skrag pa skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-11: g-yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-13: yang de'i tshe don du gnyer ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-15: koo shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:325b-16: phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-0: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba bar du gcod pa tham @326a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-1: cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams ngas bshad kyis nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-3: aa bha yi bha ya bi ga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-4: bha ya pa ri sho dha ne; aa bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-8: aa ku la pa ri shodha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-9: aa be ka la pa ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-12: te dzo te dza ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-13: sha ni au pa sha me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-15: me dri me tyud dhi te she /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-16: to sha ya na ga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-25: ba thra sa tye aaksha ye; aaksha ya pra bhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-29: aa ba bh'a sa ba hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-34: sh'i le bi sho dha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-37: ta ma ma ra b'a l'a n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-38: pa ra dza yo drishti ga hra n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-39: dzva la nam dharmo la k'a le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-41: dharmma ni dha na sya sam gra ha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-43: koo shi ka khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi dag ni khyed kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-44: phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-45: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-46: 'di bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi rnam bar smin pa ma gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326a-47: don thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces @326b bka' stsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-1: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-3: kho bo lha las ma gyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-5: kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-6: grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-7: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-8: 'di'i mthu thams cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-9: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-10: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-11: na mo aa ke tu le na ge tsanda na ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-12: sarba ya tva s'a dha ni ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-13: sarba dad ye bi sho dha ni ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-15: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-16: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-18: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-19: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-048:326b-21: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
